column5: Going out on thursday for some lakers, anyone know what the ice/walk is like out from BBP?
I was in the general area today (north shore, Oro) and walking is great...snow on the ice is firm, no slush so covering distance was easy.
Jedi  Couple cracks to navigate, near shore, but not too bad.  Once you get out, the travelling is just about perfect!  Have a Great Day out There Rick
Thanks... p.s. if anyone feels the need to share any hot spots or lures feelfre to pm me.... have yet to ice a simcoe laker.

Yup, I've been out 3 times so far and nothing for me yet.  I will try one last time for the season this Saturday.  I have been going out of Oro 2, think I might try out of Oro 7 this time.  Good luck!!!  Burt

I have been there for 3 times this season as well and just caught one 6 pounds only.Overall, they were quite active to chase lures like spoons, tubes and badboysbut they seldom gave a bite on them. Maybe I should bring some minnows with me next time.Good luck and catch a big one!
